We are excited to announce that Wood Elementary! has been awarded a School Arts Materials Grant from the South Carolina Arts Commission! The funding from this grant will help supply Mrs. Waitt and Ms. Donovan's music classrooms with a variety of instruments from around the world.

Having access to these instruments will allow students to meet the following state education standards:
Standard 1: I can arrange and compose music.
Standard 2: I can improvise music.
Standard 4: I can play instruments alone and with others.
Standard 5: I can read and notate music.
Standard 6: I can analyze music.
Standard 8: I can examine music from a variety of stylistic and historical periods and cultures.
